description: Pre-trained weights for person/customer identity matching

featureDescriptions.firstName_soundex: Soundex phonetic match for first names (0 or 1)
featureDescriptions.firstName_exact: Exact match for first names (0 or 1)
featureDescriptions.firstName_missing: Indicator if either first name is missing (0 or 1)
featureDescriptions.lastName_soundex: Soundex phonetic match for last names (0 or 1)
featureDescriptions.lastName_exact: Exact match for last names (0 or 1)
featureDescriptions.lastName_missing: Indicator if either last name is missing (0 or 1)
featureDescriptions.email_missing: Indicator if either email is missing (0 or 1)
featureDescriptions.phone_exact: Exact match for phone numbers (0 or 1)
featureDescriptions.phone_missing: Indicator if either phone is missing (0 or 1)
featureDescriptions.dateOfBirth_exact: Exact match for date of birth (0 or 1)
featureDescriptions.dateOfBirth_dateDiff: Date proximity for date of birth (exponential decay)
featureDescriptions.dateOfBirth_missing: Indicator if either date of birth is missing (0 or 1)
featureDescriptions.address_missing: Indicator if either address is missing (0 or 1)
featureDescriptions.ssn_missing: Indicator if either SSN is missing (0 or 1)
